jobs_sample.title: Senior Actuarial Analyst - Hybrid
jobs_sample.description: Looking for the peace of mind that comes from working with a well-established company? P&C client is in search of senior analysts to perform studies & recommend changes to ratemaking. The ideal candidates will possess 3 years of actuarial experience, strong communication skills and the ability to drive results. Candidates should be able to understand complex business problems & generate solutions. Personal lines experience is preferred but open to commercial casualty or property. Familiarity wi…

jobs_sample.title: Senior Actuarial Analyst - Predictive Modeling - REMOTE
jobs_sample.description: If you love complex models, this is the role for you! A P&C company is looking for an student actuary with 2 years of experience to be their next Senior Actuarial Analyst - Predictive Modeling. This role will develop predictive models for homeowners, auto, and umbrella lines. You will also have the chance to collaborate with other internal teams & to present findings directly to stakeholders. The ideal candidate would be comfortable working with large data sets, possess strong technical skills,…

jobs_sample.description: Why USAA? At USAA, our mission is to empower our members to achieve financial security through highly competitive products, exceptional service and trusted advice.
